# eui-select-option



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                     | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | If `true`, the user cannot interact with the select option.     | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `group`    | `group`    | in case of grouped options this will be the group of the option | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `selected` | `selected` | If `true`, the element is selected.                             | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `value`    | `value`    | The text value of the option.                                   | `string`  | `undefined` |
